\documentclass[russian]{article}
\usepackage[T2A,T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[a4paper]{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=1cm,bmargin=0cm,lmargin=0cm,rmargin=0cm}

\makeatletter

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
\DeclareRobustCommand{\cyrtext}{%
  \fontencoding{T2A}\selectfont\def\encodingdefault{T2A}}
\DeclareRobustCommand{\textcyr}[1]{\leavevmode{\cyrtext #1}}
\AtBeginDocument{\DeclareFontEncoding{T2A}{}{}}


\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\begin{tabular}{ccc}
\begin{tabular}{l}
Вычислить интегралы:\tabularnewline
1) $\int \frac{\ln\arccos{x} dx}{\sqrt{1 - x^2}\arccos{x}}$\tabularnewline
2) $\int \ln{(x + \sqrt{4 + x^2})} dx$\tabularnewline
3) $\int \frac{dx}{(x + 1)^2(x^2 + 1)}$\tabularnewline
4) $\int \frac{dx}{x\sqrt{5x^2 - 2x + 1}}$\tabularnewline
5) $\int \frac{\sin{x} + \sin^3{x}}{\cos{2x}}dx$\tabularnewline
Посчитать определенный интеграл:\tabularnewline
6) $\int_{e}^{e^2} \frac{dx}{x\ln{x}}$\tabularnewline
Посчитать несобственный интеграл:\tabularnewline
7) $\int_{1}^{+\infty} e^{-\sqrt{x}} dx$ \tabularnewline
Посчитать сумму ряда:\tabularnewline
8) $\sum_{n = 2}^{+\infty} \frac{1}{n^2 - 1}$

\end{tabular}& %
